00019 #ifndef _APPFRAMEWORK_H

00028 #define ZDP_USER_DESC_FIELD_SIZE  16
00029 
00030 // These defines are used only during preprocessor phase. Please use DeviceType_t enumeration values instead.
00031 #define DEV_TYPE_COORDINATOR 0
00032 #define DEV_TYPE_ROUTER 1
00033 #define DEV_TYPE_ENDDEVICE 2
00034 
00035 /* The Stack version needs to be updated for every ZigBee Pro-Core revision. 
00036      The initial version is 1 for ZigBee Pro-Core Revision r22 */
00037 #define SERVER_MASK_STACK_VERSION 0x0016
00038 
00039 /********************************************************************************
00040 * Base types
00041 ********************************************************************************/
00042 typedef uint8_t  Endpoint_t; 
00043 typedef uint16_t ProfileId_t; 
00044 typedef uint16_t ClusterId_t; 
00045 typedef uint16_t GroupAddr_t; 
00046 typedef uint8_t  StackProfile_t;

00053 BEGIN_PACK
00055 
00056 typedef struct PACK
00057 {
00058   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(4, (
00064     uint8_t   logicalType : 3,
00066     uint8_t   complexDescriptorAvailable: 1,
00068     uint8_t   userDescriptorAvailable: 1,
00070     uint8_t   reserved: 3
00071   ))
00072 
00073   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(2, (
00075     uint8_t   apsFlags : 3,
00082     uint8_t   frequencyBand : 5
00083   ))
00084 
00093   MAC_CapabilityInf_t  macCapbFlags;
00094 
00096   uint16_t manufacturerCode;
00097 
00100   uint8_t maxBufferSize;
00101 
00106   uint16_t maxTransferSize;
00107 
00118   uint16_t serverMask;
00119 
00123   uint16_t maxOutcTransferSize;
00124 
00129   uint8_t descriptorCapabilityField;
00130 } NodeDescriptor_t;
00131 
00133 
00134 typedef struct PACK
00135 {
00141   uint8_t currentPowerMode : 4;
00147   uint8_t availablePowerSources : 4;
00153   uint8_t currentPowerSource : 4;
00160   uint8_t currentPowerSourceLevel : 4;
00161 } PowerDescriptor_t;
00162 
00164 
00165 typedef struct PACK
00166 {
00169   Endpoint_t   endpoint;
00171   ProfileId_t  AppProfileId;
00173   uint16_t     AppDeviceId;
00175   uint8_t      AppDeviceVersion : 4;
00177   uint8_t      Reserved         : 4;
00180   uint8_t      AppInClustersCount;
00182   ClusterId_t* AppInClustersList;
00185   uint8_t      AppOutClustersCount;
00187   ClusterId_t* AppOutClustersList;
00188 } SimpleDescriptor_t;
00189 
00191 
00192 typedef struct PACK
00193 {
00194   uint8_t FieldLength;
00196   uint8_t FieldName[ZDP_USER_DESC_FIELD_SIZE];
00197 } UserDescriptor_t;
00198 
00199 END_PACK

00202 typedef enum
00203 {
00204   DEVICE_TYPE_COORDINATOR = DEV_TYPE_COORDINATOR,
00205   DEVICE_TYPE_ROUTER      = DEV_TYPE_ROUTER,
00206   DEVICE_TYPE_END_DEVICE  = DEV_TYPE_ENDDEVICE
00207 } DeviceType_t;
00208 
00210 enum
00211 {
00212   MAC_CAP_ALTERNATE_PAN_COORDINATOR = 0x01,
00213   MAC_CAP_DEVICE_TYPE_FFD = 0x02,
00214   MAC_CAP_POWER_SOURCE_MAINS = 0x04,
00215   MAC_CAP_RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE = 0x08,
00216   MAC_CAP_SECURITY_CAPABLE = 0x40,
00217   MAC_CAP_ALLOCATE_ADDRESS = 0x80 // always set for rev13
00218 };

00244   RECEIVER_COMES_PERIODICALLY = 1,
00245   RECEIVER_COMES_WHEN_STIMULATED = 2
00246   //RESERVED = 0xF /* all other values */
00247 } PowerMode_t;
00248 
00251 typedef enum
00252 {
00253   MAINS_POWER = 0x1,
00254   RECHARGEABLE_BATTERY = 0x2,
00255   DISPOSABLE_BATTERY = 0x4,
00256   //RESERVED
00257 } PowerSource_t;

00261 {

00263   PERCENT_33 = 4,
00264   PERCENT_66 = 8,
00265   PERCENT_100 = 0xC
00266   //RESERVED = 0xFF;  /* all over values */
00267 } PowerSourceLevel_t;
